screen.name: iDreamAddToDatabase
screen.title: Add music files to iDream database

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (15, 20), size = (48, 38), png = 0), # index 0 is the PC pixmap (for pixmap it is png= ) MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 18), size = (200, 45), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the Name (for text it is text= ) MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (410, 20), size = (40, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the system pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (500, 3), size = (500, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the IP MultiContentEntryText(pos = (500, 40), size = (500, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is the MAC ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30),gFont("Regular", 26)], "itemHeight": 80 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos=(0,0), size=(150,108), png=2), # Thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos=(165,1), size=(1000,78), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER|RT_WRAP, text=3), # Title MultiContentEntryText(pos=(180, 73), size=(400,34), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text=4), # Views MultiContentEntryText(pos=(580,73), size=(400,34), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text=5), # Duration ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",30), gFont("Regular",25)], "itemHeight": 108}
